mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_id as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_collection_types as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianCollectionTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.laoshi_id as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianLaoshiId ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_uuid_number as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianUuidNumber ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_name as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianName ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_photo as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianPhoto ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_video as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianVideo ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_file as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianFile ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_types as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianTypes ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_content as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianContent ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_delete as jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_collection a left JOIN jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian ON a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_id = jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_id = #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_collection_types = #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianCollectionTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_id IS NOT NULL
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId}
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianUuidNumber},'%')
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianName},'%')
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianVideo},'%')
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_types = #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianTypes}
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianContent},'%')
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_delete >= #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianDeleteStart}
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_delete <= #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianDeleteEnd}
and jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjian_delete = #{params.jisuanjizhuanyeruanjianDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
